{"title": "Vocabulator", "title_search": "vocabulator", "title_keyword": "vocabulator", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/vocabulator/", "summary": "** Vocabulator ** Easy to learn, simple to play, Vocabulator is a word game for anyone over the age of 4. All you have to do is find as many words as you can hidden in a scrambled word. Sounds easy, right? Well, when the scrambled word is only 6 letters long, it is. But try it with an 11-letter word and things get a little more challenging.   ** Many benefits ** You might be a Scrabble™ fan and want a way to practice when your friends aren’t looking.  Or you might be someone with a passion for the popular Target Word puzzles in newspapers and magazines.  You might just want to work on your spelling or increase your vocabulary.  With puzzles that present scrambled words ranging from 6 to 11 letters, Vocabulator can help you with any of these ambitions.  ** You’re in control ** Extending the concept of target word games, Vocabulator allows you to control whether or not you must use a particular letter in each puzzle and how long the “base” word is for every game you play.   A base word that uses all the letters is always there to be found but so are many other “sub-words”.  There is no time limit to games you play, so you choose when to stop looking for words.  ** Educational ** Vocabulator is a great way for kids to improve their understanding of words. Starting with 6-letter words and moving on to games with longer base words will allow them to improve their vocabulary, as they are able to form bigger words from each puzzle.  At the end of every game, the list of possible words is presented along with an automatic link to dictionary.com, so they can look up the definition of unfamiliar words.  ** Features **  - Set and forget You only need to visit the settings page once and your preferences are remembered for every game you play.  So just launch and go.  - Resume game Interrupted by a phone call while playing?  No problem. The game will restore itself to its previous state when you come back. Careful though, time is a factor in scoring so don’t be away too long!  - Rewards Every game has built-in rewards as you find and enter words.  You are cheered on as you progress from good through very good and excellent until you reach perfect!  - Shake to shuffle Before you give up on any game, try shaking the phone to re-scramble the letters.  A different view might reveal more words.  - Silent mode Don’t want people to know you’re playing when you really should be studying?  Fine, turn off sound and still get visual cues for correct words, progress and rewards.  - Statistics Keep track of how you’re performing by looking at your average score, words per minute and per game across all the different word length settings.  - Team play You don’t have to play on your own. Vocabulator is even more fun when playing with your friends or family and everyone pitches in.  ** Connected ** You can even share your scores with the world-wide Vocabulator community.  You’ll be able to impress your friends with solid evidence of your wordsmithery!", "genre": ["Edutainment"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-12-16", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-137194-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-137194-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Nexus6 Software (Developer)", "Nexus6 Software (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Heron: Steam Machine", "title_search": "heron steam machine", "title_keyword": "heron steam machine", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/heron-steam-machine/", "summary": "[WiiWare] Heron: Steam Machine is a game about a factory where rubber duckies are being produced by a large steam engine. On this steam engine, there are four different gauges which you will have to watch carefully. By connecting the pipes, you will earn points and relieve some of the pressure, keeping the machine running just a little bit longer. If one of the gauges reaches its maximum, the machine will eventually blow up, and the game is over. If you were lucky enough to achieve a high score, make sure you enter your name in the list so other players can compete with you. {"title": "Word Search Ultimate", "title_search": "word search ultimate", "title_keyword": "word search ultimate", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/word-search-ultimate/", "summary": "Word Search is a hidden word puzzle game with 4 difficulty levels and over 80 different word lists with unique themes to choose from.   Word Search provides the classic word search puzzle or word finder game for the iPhone and iPod touch. Unlike other word search or word finder games in the store, Word Search doesn't have a limited set of pre-canned puzzles. Word Search can generate virtually an unlimited number of puzzles, and it generates a unique puzzle every time. And the number of words is not limited to a half dozen like some of the free applications, or even 16 like some paid applications. Word Search puts as many words as it can from the category you choose into the puzzle. Many times over 30 words in a 11x13 grid! What a challenge! Word Search puzzles are fun, provide many levels of difficulty, and are a great way to pass the time and improve your vocabulary.   To play Word Search, find the hidden words in the puzzle and swipe them with your finger. Hidden words can appear in any orientation - up, down, left, right, or diagonally - and in either direction, forward or backward. In a word search puzzle, words can overlap so that a letter can be part of two or more words. If you have trouble finding words, simply tap the "Words" button and reduce the level of difficulty on the puzzle to get more clues. Finally, if you just can't find one or more words, tap the "Solution" button and all the words in the puzzle will be revealed. Once all words are selected, you win! {"title": "Find Your Own Way Home", "title_search": "find your own way home", "title_keyword": "find your own way home", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/find-your-own-way-home/", "summary": "In Find Your Own Way Home, the player takes the role of Ruby, a hip Hollywood reporter for the entertainment television program, Entertainment Now.  For the past few weeks, Ruby has been on assignment with the legendary rock band, REO Speedwagon. {"title": "Igowin 13x13", "title_search": "igowin 13x13", "title_keyword": "igowin 13x13", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/igowin-13x13/", "summary": "Igowin 13x13 brings the ancient game of strategy, Go, into the 21st century and puts it right in the palm of your hand. With the most powerful Go software available for the iPhone or iPod Touch, Igowin 13x13 will challenge you no matter what your level, and keep you at the top of your game.  Igowin 13x13 uses the same Go engine as The Many Faces Of Go. That's the three time world computer Go champion that has been in ongoing development for over 25 years. It draws on more than two and a half decades of experience, a massive knowledge base and the newest research, as well as modern Monte Carlo techniques to help you learn and grow as a player. This is, hands down, the strongest Go engine available for the iPhone or iPod Touch.  Igowin 13x13 has the most comprehensive tutorial of any app of its kind. You get a good solid understanding of the game, and can begin playing immediately. With no complex menus and just a few basic controls, the game is easy to navigate. The convenient "undo" feature lets you reset a mis-tap, without waiting for the computer to finish thinking. All levels are calibrated by play, on an online server. That means that the ranking Igowin 13x13 gives you is very close to what your real-world ranking would be, rather than an arbitrary number that only applies within the app.  Igowin 13x13 uses the traditional Kyu ranking system to measure your performance.  The engine automatically adjusts its level of play to match yours. By using the calibrated rankings within the Go engine, it can play a 13x13 even game, with no handicaps, against any player, from beginner all the way up to 3 dan level.     Whether you're a rookie looking for a fun new way to learn and play the game of Go, or a crafty veteran looking for a challenge, Igowin 13x13 is the app you've been searching for. Take Igowin 13x13 wherever you go, and play it whenever you have a few minutes to burn.  It's always ready for a quick game, or a long session.   With Igowin 13x13 on your iPhone or iPod Touch, you're ready to start playing the 4000 year old game that takes a few minutes to learn, and a lifetime to master.", "genre": ["Board"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-02-25", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-147891-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-147891-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Smart Games (Publisher)", "Smart Games (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}
